mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_DIARY (DIARY_ID, USER_NUMBER, DIARY_DATE, DIARY_TITLE, DIARY_EMO, DIARY_CONTENT) VALUES (#{diaryId}, #{userNumber}, #{diaryDate}, #{diaryTitle}, #{diaryEmo}, #{diaryContent})
mapper.select: SELECT D.DIARY_DATE, D.DIARY_TITLE, D.DIARY_EMO, D.DIARY_CONTENT FROM TBL_DIARY D JOIN TBL_USERS U ON D.USER_NUMBER = U.USER_NUMBER WHERE D.DIARY_ID = #{diaryId}
SELECT D.DIARY_EMO FROM TBL_DIARY D JOIN TBL_USERS U ON D.USER_NUMBER = U.USER_NUMBER WHERE DIARY_DATE = #{diaryDate}
